name: Empty Space (Mough)
description:
As the greatest (FACT) President ever, you have instructed the "Medical Doctors" to shrink you down to miniature size in order to allow you to enter though your own anal passage  and cure yourself of the "China Virus" in your own inimitable way.  

Work your way up through your"astonishingly excellent" body until you reach your "cognitively there" brain.

This game involves navigating your way up from Donald Trump's fundament to his brain.

Points are scored for each Corona Virus you manage to kill off with your Bleach, your Flashlight or your trusty Tweets.
